name: Food Fight 2D Shooter
description:
This little 2D shooter was my second project in the Coursera / University of Michigan Unity game development course. Starting with the course's model game, I adjusted the look and feel of the UI elements and added the simple fruit and veg animations and a new non-space level 2.

Then I went on and broke something without saving this stable version, so I can't make any more improvements or corrections at this stage - a super learning experience! I could rebuild it, but at the moment will spend my time on new projects to share.

To play: Use cursors to move, left mouse button to fire and mouse to aim.

Basically just shoot everything and try not to get shot too much. Different snacks have different points if you're after a high score.

Credits: Created by Louis Greenberg
